cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)
project(DBoW2)

set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS}  -Wall  -O3")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Wall  -O3")

set(HDRS_DBOW2
  DBoW2/BowVector.h
  DBoW2/FORB.h 
  DBoW2/FClass.h       
  DBoW2/FeatureVector.h
  DBoW2/ScoringObject.h   
  DBoW2/TemplatedVocabulary.h)
set(SRCS_DBOW2
  DBoW2/BowVector.cpp
  DBoW2/FORB.cpp      
  DBoW2/FeatureVector.cpp
  DBoW2/ScoringObject.cpp)

set(HDRS_DUTILS
  DUtils/Random.h
  DUtils/Timestamp.h)
set(SRCS_DUTILS
  DUtils/Random.cpp
  DUtils/Timestamp.cpp)

set(OpenCV_DIR "$ENV{OpenCV_DIR}")
find_package(OpenCV 3.3.0 REQUIRED)
if(NOT OpenCV_FOUND)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "OpenCV 3.3.0 not found.")
endif()

add_library(DBoW2 SHARED ${SRCS_DBOW2} ${SRCS_DUTILS})
target_link_libraries(DBoW2 ${OpenCV_LIBS})
target_include_directories(DBoW2 PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)
include(GenerateExportHeader)
set(CMAKE_CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden)
set(CMAKE_VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 1)
generate_export_header(DBoW2)

install(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME}
  RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin
  ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib
  LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib)
install(FILES ${HDRS_DBOW2} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include/ORB_SLAM2/Thirdparty/DBoW2/DBoW2)
install(FILES ${HDRS_DUTILS} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include/ORB_SLAM2/Thirdparty/DBoW2/DUtils)
install(FILES ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/dbow2_export.h DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include/ORB_SLAM2/Thirdparty/DBoW2/DBoW2)
install(FILES ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/dbow2_export.h DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include/ORB_SLAM2/Thirdparty/DBoW2/DUtils)
